message: Let's be fair and take 60% for me, 40% for you. It's a good offer considering I'm the one starting!
Your turn Alice. I'm feeling generous, but let's not drag this out.  Remember the money shrinks!
I'll give you a bit more than last time, but don't think you can take advantage of me! 58% for me, 42% for you, take it or leave it!
Alice, the clock is ticking and we're both losing money.  This is my final offer, let's be sensible and end this.
